languages.text: Хлопок — над головами офицеров разрываются трубы, и поток горячего воздуха отшвыривает пустотнорожденного от Лорд-капитана, пробивая его телом панель когитатора. Кадр безудержно крутит — сервочереп толкнуло порывом. Пикт-рекордер запотевает, вокс фиксирует треск разрядов и предсмертный вопль. "Газ на мостике!" — кричит младший помощник, и тут же сгибается пополам, хватая ртом ядовитый воздух.

traits.locale_text: Вой сирены заглушает слова офицера. Трубы над головой лопаются, и поток горячего воздуха отшвыривает Кельбо к стене, пробивая телом когитатор. Сервочереп закручивает от внезапного порыва. Один из его окуляров запотевает, но через второй видно, как мощные разряды тока проходят по телу офицера, пока не стихают его вопли. "Газ на мостике!" — кричит младший помощник, и тут же сгибается пополам, хватая ртом ядовитый воздух.

languages.text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

Кадр безудержно крутит — сервочереп толкнуло порывом. Пикт-рекордер запотевает, вокс фиксирует треск разрядов и предсмертный вопль. "Газ на мостике!" — кричит младший помощник, и тут же сгибается пополам, хватая ртом ядовитый воздух.

traits.locale_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, the body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The frame is spinning uncontrollably — the servo-skull was pushed by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

languages.text: Se oye un estallido: las tuberías del techo sobre los oficiales revientan y un soplo de aire caliente aleja al nacido en el vacío de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, lanzándolo a través del panel de un cogitador. El grabaimágenes gira descontrolado cuando la ráfaga de aire sacude al servocráneo. La imagen se empaña y el voco registra un chisporroteo eléctrico y un grito de muerte. Un asistente grita «¡Gas en el puente!» y cae a plomo tras inhalar el aire tóxico.
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

traits.locale_text: Se oye un estallido: las tuberías del techo sobre los oficiales revientan y un soplo de aire caliente aleja al nacido en el vacío de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, lanzándolo a través del panel de un cogitador. El grabaimágenes gira descontrolado cuando la ráfaga de aire sacude al servocráneo. La imagen se empaña y el voco registra un chisporroteo eléctrico y un grito de muerte. Un asistente grita «¡Gas en el puente!» y cae a plomo tras inhalar el aire tóxico.

languages.text: 随着一声巨响，那位军官头上的管道爆炸了。一股热浪迸发出来，将那位虚空之子朝着远离领主舰长的方向掀了出去，身体砸穿了沉思者的面板。热浪让伺服头骨也剧烈颠簸起来，视讯记录的屏幕不受控制地旋转着。随后，画面变得模糊起来，音阵装置传来了噼里啪啦的电流声，以及某个人临死之前的呼喊。“舰桥上有毒气！”一位低阶侍从喊了起来，随即吸入了一口有毒的空气，立刻痛苦地弓起了腰。
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

traits.locale_text: 随着一声巨响，那位军官头上的管道爆炸了。一股热浪迸发出来，将那位虚空之子朝着远离领主舰长的方向掀了出去，身体砸穿了思考器的面板。热浪让伺服头骨也剧烈颠簸起来，视讯记录的屏幕不受控制地旋转着。随后，画面变得模糊起来，音阵装置传来了噼里啪啦的电流声，以及某个人临死之前的呼喊。“舰桥上有毒气！”一位低阶侍从喊了起来，随即吸入了一口有毒的空气，立刻痛苦地弓起了腰。

languages.text: ボンッという大きな音がする。士官たちの頭上のパイプが破裂し、熱風がロード・キャプテンから虚空生まれを吹き飛ばしたことで、男の体が考算機のパネルへと一直線に叩きつけられた。映像フレームは制御不能になってぐるぐる回り、サーヴォスカルは突風で揺さぶられた。ピクト・レコーダーは曇り、ヴォクスは電気のパチパチという音と断末魔のような叫び声を拾う。「ブリッジの上でガスが！」下級従者が叫び、毒が混じった空気を吸い込んでウッと体を折り曲げた。
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

traits.locale_text: ボンッという大きな音がする。士官たちの頭上のパイプが破裂し、熱風がロード・キャプテンから虚空生まれを吹き飛ばしたことで、男の体が考算機のパネルへと一直線に叩きつけられた。映像フレームは制御不能になってぐるぐる回り、サーヴォスカルは突風で揺さぶられた。ピクト・レコーダーは曇り、ヴォクスは電気のパチパチという音と断末魔のような叫び声を拾う。「ブリッジの上でガスが！」下級従者が叫び、毒が混じった空気を吸い込んでウッと体を折り曲げた。

languages.text: Ein lauter Knall – die Rohre über den Köpfen der Offiziere platzen, und ein heißer Luftstoß schleudert den Leerengeborenen vom Lord Captain weg und schleudert ihn gegen eine Cogitatorentafel. Der Bildrahmen dreht sich unkontrolliert – der Servoschädel wurde von der Böe durchgeschüttelt. Der Bildrekorder beschlägt, das Vox-Gerät nimmt das Knistern von Elektrizität und einen Todesschrei auf. "Gas auf der Brücke!", schreit ein junges Crewmitglied und bricht augenblicklich zusammen, weil es die vergiftete Luft eingeatmet hat.
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

languages.text: À cet instant, les tuyaux au-dessus de l'officier éclatent, et un jet d'air chaud le projette violemment contre le panneau d'un cogitateur. L'enregistreur du servocrâne, lui aussi secoué par le jaillissement d'air, se met à tourner dans tous les sens, et l'écran se couvre de buée. On entend seulement le crépitement de l'électricité et un râle d'agonie. « Gaz sur le pont ! » s'écrie un officier subalterne avant de se plier en deux en respirant l'air empoisonné.
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

traits.locale_text: À cet instant, les tuyaux au-dessus de l'officier éclatent, et un jet d'air chaud le projette violemment contre le panneau d'un cogitateur. L'enregistreur du servocrâne, lui aussi secoué par le jaillissement d'air, se met à tourner dans tous les sens, et l'écran se couvre de buée. On entend seulement le crépitement de l'électricité et un râle d'agonie. « Gaz sur le pont ! » s'écrie un officier subalterne avant de se plier en deux en respirant l'air empoisonné.

languages.text: Gürültülü bir patlama sesi duyuluyor. Subayların başlarının üzerindeki borular patlayıp saçılan sıcak hava, uçsuzdoğanı Lord Kaptan'dan uzağa fırlatıyor. Vücudu, doğrudan bir kavramsayar paneline çarpıyor. Foto sahnesi kontrolsüz bir şekilde dönüyor, belli ki hizmelet de patlamadan nasibini almış. Foto kaydedici buğulanıyor. Vokstan elektrik çatırdaması ve bir ölüm çığlığı duyuluyor. "Köprüye gaz sızdı!" diye bağıran kıdemsiz bir görevli, zehirli havayı soluyarak oracıkta iki büklüm oluyor.
languages.original_text: A loud pop — the pipes over the officers' heads burst, and a blast of hot air flings the voidborn away from the Lord Captain, his body slamming straight through a cogitator panel. The pict frame spins uncontrollably — the servo-skull was jolted by the gust. The pict-recorder fogs over, the vox picking up the crackling of electricity and a death cry. "Gas on the bridge!" a junior attendant shouts and instantly doubles over, inhaling the poisoned air.

traits.locale_text: Gürültülü bir patlama sesi duyuluyor. Subayların başlarının üzerindeki borular patlayıp saçılan sıcak hava, uçsuzdoğanı Lord Kaptan'dan uzağa fırlatıyor. Vücudu, doğrudan bir kavramsayar paneline çarpıyor. Foto sahnesi kontrolsüz bir şekilde dönüyor, belli ki hizmelet de patlamadan nasibini almış. Foto kayıt cihazı buğulanıyor. Vokstan elektrik çatırdaması ve bir ölüm çığlığı duyuluyor. "Köprüye gaz sızdı!" diye bağıran kıdemsiz bir görevli, zehirli havayı soluyarak oracıkta iki büklüm oluyor.
